subject: Order #SSN2598
description_text:
Hello,

I am following up regarding the return and refund request for my order (#S
*SN2598*). I previously initiated a return and provided the tracking number
as requested. According to the carrierâ€™s tracking information, the return
package was delivered on *[9-23-2025]* (proof of delivery is attached).

Since then, I have not received any updates. I reached out again last month
requesting a status update, but I have not received a response.

The return shipment cost me over $100, and I would appreciate an update on
the status of my refund as soon as possible. Please confirm that the
returned items have been received and let me know when I can expect the
refund to be processed.

Thank you,
ML

conversations.body_text: We apologize for the delay in processing your refund. Your refund has now been issued.
